downloadTitle: Documents and Records Management Decision Accelerator Datasheet
downloadDescription: Documents and Records Management Decision Accelerator is a consulting Offering designed to give you the reassurance required for deploying the Microsoft Office SharePoint Enterprise Content Management solution for Documents and Records Management.
detailsSection: Documents and Records Management Decision Accelerator is a consulting Offering designed to give you the reassurance required for deploying the Microsoft Office SharePoint Enterprise Content Management solution for Documents and Records Management by providing you with an opportunity to evaluate the solution’s capabilities in your own test environment. Microsoft Services expert consultants utilize best practices to deliver a Proof-of-Concept evaluation of SharePoint as a comprehensive and well-integrated solution for managing, archiving, preserving, and destroying documents and records and reducing risk through improved regulatory and corporate compliance.
installInstructionSection: To download this document, please click the download button.
